A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I've been a Star Wars fan my entire life. I have never felt compelled to write a review of a movie as this is the first time in my life if written a review. That being said I can't even find the words to explain how much I disliked the last Jedi. I liked the force awakens\, and rouge one so I am definitely not against the new generation of Star Wars. The last Jedi has taken Star Wars in the wrong direction I was so dissatisfied leaving the theatre I'm still in shock. Everybody is entitled to there own opinion but I believe I speak for the majority of fans that they really screwed this one up. I just really hope they learn from this and come back with something better in the future. Again I felt compelled to write this review due to my immediate dissatisfaction of watching the last Jedi. Help us George Lucas your our only hope!!!!
